title: Cubus
author: Cubus
created_time: August 17, 2022, 01:44:24 PMLast edit: August 17, 2022, 02:57:40 PM by Cubus
content: Dear Bitcointalk Community!ZenPulsar is here offering an outstanding Bounty Campaign for the real Crypto-enthusiasts.ZenPulsar is a groundbreaking AI training platform with an increadible potential. But without a community like you, we are unable to develop further. ZenPulsar hires crypto experts to train our AI recognition of Crypto Tweets. Those who speak following languages are urgently needed:- Japanese- Italian- Spanish- French- Arabic- Portuguese- Polish- Tagalog- Turkish- KoreanThe task contains these activities: • To look through the database of tweets on our platform • To mark them as relevant or irrelevant Those who apply for this task will have an access to our community trainings and will be generously rewarded!If you are interested and have a fluent/native command of one of these languages, please fill this form below:https://forms.gle/xNhEGhUBCahf4idi6Please reply in comments after you have completed the form so we could contact you quicker

comments.author: Biraz
comments.body: #PROOF OF REGISTRATIONForum Username: BirazForum Profile Link: https://bitcointalk.org/index.php?action=profile;u=3516633Telegram Username: @Rol43Participated Campaigns: Twitter, Telegram, DiscordBSC Wallet Address: 0xBa6B9E5dF81B4569cf6BEBfB068AC7cB74aedE7c
